name: Lilt
description: Lilt is the leading AI solution for enterprise translations. Their stack, made up of our Contextual AI Engine, Connector APIs, and Human Adaptive Feedback, enables global organizations to adopt a true AI translation strategy, focusing on business outcomes instead of outputs. With Lilt, innovative, category-defining organizations like Intel, ASICS, WalkMe, and Canva are using AI technology to deliver multilingual, digital customer experiences at scale.
